item.title: New conference talks
item.description:
New year, new conference season!

My recent study with Stephie has been accepted at the SASE 2022 and the AOM 2022 Annual Conference! If you want to meet up in beautiful Amsterdam and/or Seattle make sure to drop me a mail!

item.title: Welcome to my page
item.description:
New page launched!

I am very happy that I have finally found the time to compile this new site that focuses on my work as a researcher. On it, you can find announcements for talks, teaching materials, papers, data, code and everything else that has to do with my work. Also, I will share some (hopefully) nifty tricks that I learned in my ten years as an empirical researcher that utilizes large-scale secondary data.

Enjoy reading and browsing and feel free to drop me a mail in case you have any questions!
